text: The list of botanical gardens is ordered alphabetically by country: ==Ancient Babylon== # Hanging Gardens of Babylon ==Australia== # Australian National Botanic Gardens # Carlton Gardens, Melbourne == Belgium== # Pairi Daiza ==Brazil== # Botanical Garden of Curitiba ==Canada== # Dominion Arboretum # Central Experimental Farm # Stanley Park ==China== # Jichang Garden ==France== # Jardin des Plantes # Roseraie de L'Ha√ø ==Italy== # Boboli's Garden # Orto botanico di Pisa ==Germany== # Palmengarten ==Israel== # Jerusalem Botanical Gardens # National Botanic Garden of Israel # Wohl Rose Park ==Pakistan== # Shalimar Gardens Lahore ==Singapore== # Gardens by the Bay ==United Kingdom== # Kew Gardens # Royal Surrey Gardens # Vauxhall Gardens ==United States== # Brooklyn Botanic Garden # Cincinnati Zoo and Botanical Garden # Cypress Gardens # United States Botanic Garden # United States National Arboretum ==References== * botanical gardens botanical gardens
title: List of botanical gardens
